name: Tenebra 2 (Commodore 64 / Commodore Plus4)
description:
This is a direct sequel to my popular game Tenebra, with more game play elements and an exciting new tool at your disposal.

Similar to its prequel, Tenebra 2 is an atmospheric puzzle game with rogue-like elements. Guide the hapless protagonist to the exit, but also keep in mind that he is afraid of darkness and refuses to walk in the dark areas.

This preview version contains the first 9 levels, and works on both PAL and NTSC machines.
